Action.author: rhegde
Action.body: Can you please confirm if client using Fabric Java SDK will receive the following response (3 parts - status (int32), payload (byte array) and message (string) as a direct access variable) as we set in the user-chaincode?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body:
